term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - active site in heterogeneous catalysis
term.title: active site

item.text: The term is often applied to those sites for adsorption which are the effective sites for a particular heterogeneous catalytic reaction. The terms active site and active centre are often used as synonyms, but active centre may also be used to describe an ensemble of sites at which a catalytic reaction takes place.
